title: NO FIRENDS.. LOOKING FOR FRIENDS TO REAP BONUS IP
body: Hey people i have no friends on my lol account so people should add me and lets get a 5 man normals team going to reap the bonus IP rewards :) with a 5man team we can get 16x the IP points so add me! IGN: Hairless Iguana

replies.body: Don't get your hopes up, it seems Riot lied about the values (either that or it's bugged, badly). Highest bonus I've gotten, with 5-man pre-mades, is 2 IP. Same can be said for several of my friends. I know people who've not yet got any bonus despite being in a 5-man pre-made.
not true.... I had a game before and I got 100 ip with the 2x bonus so your wrong there
Well then seems you're one of the lucky ones who aren't having problems with it.
Will. E on later tody so anyone that is keen drop say so! Keen to get a 5man going!
Wow rito why you do this -.- hope it's just a bug that will get patched
